citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4 pm on
13-Sep-16.
Arrived at home around 4 PM. No one was home. Waited in driveway until 4:20 PM and no one arrived.
